website_summaries.verdict: Four Paws dog cologne has been a favorite with professional groomers for decades.
pros: Can be re-applied several times between baths
Minimal amount of product required for good results
cons: Fragrance described as powder-like, reminiscent of older cologne brands for humans

customer_reviews.title: Amazon shows a pic of the old style that worked great. I am a professional dog groomer thats been ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this spray three times and none of the sprayers worked. Look at all the reviews about this. Amazon why are you still selling defective sprays. The problem is they changed to a new sprayer and they dont work!! Amazon shows a pic of the old style that worked great. I am a professional dog groomer thats been using this for years but since the company FOUR PAWS that makes this changed sorayers i will not be purchasing it again. DO NOT BUY..WASTING YOUR MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: holly jericiau

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Spray Nozzle!
customer_reviews.text: How many times do folks have to complain about the spray nozzle being broke or not working at all before you people do something about your quality control. Yet you choose to continue to rip people off. You should be ashamed of yourselves. The smell if this cologne is awesome but I’ve had 3 cans that wouldn’t spray. I keep trying because I love the scent and it is long lasting. Please, please look into this and do something about this cheap spray nozzle .
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Hogan-Clark

customer_reviews.title: Red one comes as pictured/ black one does not.
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness, I got the Red one for my 4mo chow and I only used it on him once just to see how it smells, I love it it lasts for a while and the smell is just like CK men’s cologne, haven’t tried it right after a bath when he is still wet yet. Oh and this one comes as pictured while the Black one it shows you Four Paws but you get Magic one which is completely different I’ve ordered it twice but got the Magic one instead of the Four Paws. So just get the red one you will be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: Senada2006

customer_reviews.title: Please fix the sprayer 😭 it smells so good, but the nozzle broke after a couple uses
customer_reviews.text: It smells AMAZING.....DISCLAIMER: it worked great for maybe three separate uses before the spray nozzle no longer worked. There’s still plenty of the product left, but i no longer have a way to use it as the sprayer gave out. I was super excited about it cause my big floppy 70 pound boxer can work up a stink quick. I was bummed out when it broke so quickly. I love the smell. But i won’t buy it again until they use a different kind of spray mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Smells really good!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the red and the black bottle. The black one smells like a regular men's cologne and the red one smells just like Calvin Klein's CK1. I like the black one, but the red one smells awesome! My dog smells really good when we spray it on him. It's just like people cologne though. It doesn't get rid of any bad smell, but masks them by covering it up with a new pleasant smell. And just like normal cologne, the awesome smell fades as the day goes by. It works very well to cover up the "dog" smell, and for that reason, I would definitely reorder this item.
customer_reviews.author: kbank

customer_reviews.title: Will not spray!
customer_reviews.text: loved the smell but after one spray the can got clogged! I have it and probably need to return but such a hassle. The product is what my personal dog groomer uses and I love the smell. Maybe another can would work. You would think I would have been offered another can to replace the one that is defective. However, I have not heard anything from the seller or Amazon! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie F. Irwin

customer_reviews.title: My dogs are smelling wonderful ;0)
customer_reviews.text: The product is good just make sure your pet is wet before. I tried it both ways when the dog is dry you can smell it for a day or so but when the dog is wet it last longer. Yes the direction state spay on wet dog but I just wanted to see the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Joan S Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Cologne won’t spray & can’t return
customer_reviews.text: Had always loved this dog cologne but the last two I ordered won’t spray. The top twists to the opening but won’t work. The window for returning them had already passed by the time the previous one was gone & I went to use one of the two new ones. BOTH of them don’t work!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: VERY STRONG
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving 4 stars because the product does what it says. What I like about this product is that it definitely takes the dog smell away. At least a couple of days. Which I consider good! What I don’t like about it is how strong the initial scent is. I’m not usually bothered by strong smells. But this makes the entire room smell. And it’s doggy cologne. Not exactly what I want my home to smell like! LOL I did follow another reviewers recommendation to apply when your pet is still wet from bath. I also applied when dry. Product was not as effective when pet was dry.
customer_reviews.author: Mickie hall

customer_reviews.title: Sprayer Sucks
customer_reviews.text: It would be a fabulous product if only I could use it. The sprayer truly sucks and you can’t even transfer the product to a different delivery system. You’re stuck with a sealed can of inaccessible product. Jerks
customer_reviews.author: Diane Sims

customer_reviews.title: So so...
customer_reviews.text: It did come earlier than expected. Not real find of the smell. A strong alcohol/butane smell. The fragrance is just so so. When it arrived, there was no cap and the spray top was broken. I don't want the hassle of returning it so I pryed off the top and realigned it. There's no top but it sprays. Makes my dog sneeze too.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn E Silvers

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Many reviews gave negative feedback but I thought I would give it a try as I had an older can that was great; It had a regular spray nozzle. This has a different nozzle and it acts just like it has no pressure. I agree with other reviews, it doesn't need to be sold until it's repackaged........(JUNK)!! Wish I could review and give no stars!! DO NOT PURCHASE unless you want to get refund as you can't return. Only positive was dealing with Amazon for refund.... GREAT!!
customer_reviews.author: lively0325

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent and a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this dog cologne for 10 years. I will continue to keep purchasing it over and over again. I just love the scent and most people think I had my dog groomed when I actually didn’t, yet. Not to mention just a little spritz goes a long way. I am a very faithful and loyal customer.
customer_reviews.author: Natalee Nimmo

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this product b4 n I just love how it smells
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product b4 n I just love how it smells. Ur gonna but once I put it on n went out n my friends asked me omg, you smell so good what r u wearing I said dog Cologne 4paws lol. I almost died the look they gave me. Lol, they couldn't believe it. But I did it for laughs. But my dogs smell so good. I just had to share a funny story.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Bow, Wow, Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Professional Dog Trainer and they work hard. So, after a long days work, sometimes they.... Well, stink. After a bath and dry, just a puff of this and they're ready to go. They enjoy the attention of the ladys. ;-) W()()F W()()F
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Doggie Cologne
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Four Paws dog cologne on my babies for years!!! It smells awesome and stays with the puppy longer than other cologne brands on the market. I raise puppies and I will always squirt a bit of the cologne on the puppy before it goes to it's new forever home. The new Adoptive parents are always contacting me asking me what kind of cologne I put on the puppy when I sent it home and where can they buy some!!! You will not be disappointed in this cologne for your 4 legged friend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Four Paws Cologne
customer_reviews.text: As noted in at least one other review product arrived with no top. When I have purchased this product in a pet store it has always had a top on it. This is my favorite aroma of the other colognes in this product line; last only a day or so which is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for many years and many of our dogs. Would recommend it to anyone. A funny story is one time I was hosting a party and my mother and sister came out of my bedroom smelling like the dog perfume. We all had a good laugh because it was on my dresser with my other perfumes.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A Erker

customer_reviews.title: My dog won't tolerate it
customer_reviews.text: I tried using a small amount of this on my golden retriever and he doesn't like it. He immediately rolled around on the ground to try to get the smell off. The smell is nice but it has been a waste of money since my dog won't tolerate it.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie ♡

customer_reviews.title: Best scent on the market
customer_reviews.text: I’m a pet sitter and this by far is the best smelling doggie cologne on the market... I return each of my doggies and kitties with a spray of this on and the parents just love it
customer_reviews.author: Angela Austin

customer_reviews.title: May not spray
customer_reviews.text: Smells great. Sprayer was broke so it just does not spray right. I read reviews and people often have this problem with this spray can.
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE
customer_reviews.text: I got the two bottles of cologne and they are not working so I can spray cologne, in other words I lost my money. Also, when I tried to return the bottles they have a non return policy. BAD, BAD, BAD.
customer_reviews.author: ANA O. HAMPTON

customer_reviews.title: Its strong and smells nice
customer_reviews.text: Smells so good but as soon he goes for a walk he smells again like a dog...this hapoens with all perfumes dog ..so i just put it again
customer_reviews.author: Ruth C

customer_reviews.title: So it's essentially useless and a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived damaged. The plastic was full of the liquid spray and the spray nozzle won't activate. So it's essentially useless and a waste of money. Can't return due to restrictions so I'm not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Constance C.

customer_reviews.title: What a rip off
customer_reviews.text: I received the canister and it was 2/3rds empty. Unfortunately for me, this purchase was not eligible for return.
customer_reviews.author: Melvia Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Ew Old man cologne!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about this product until it arrived and I tried it out. If anyone has ever hear of Black Sauve cologne that's what this product smells like. It reminds me of cologne that my grandfather would wear, it smelt like old man, and it was nasty. Lol. I know that's terrible but it's the truth. I'm going to try an send this product back.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great smell but the can spray nozzle is cheap
customer_reviews.text: Great smell but the can spray nozzle is cheap. So I can’t get any more out. This is my second time buying this. So I have two full cans with broken nozzle. Never again!!!
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: I love the smell of the cologne
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of the cologne. But I guess they changed the bottle and this is the second bottle I've bought that has broken. I tested it when I first got it, it sat on the shelf for about a week, and I tried it and nothing coming out. Only a weak stream.. So guess I'll have to trash it
customer_reviews.author: WarlockGrl

customer_reviews.title: Best scent after a bath
customer_reviews.text: I have had dogs for most of my life and no other scent can’t really compare to this one. I really recommend this cologne because you really don’t need to use a lot to make your pet smell amazing! I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Lua

customer_reviews.title: Simply smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: OMG this smells amazing on my little boy toy poodle! Took one star away because the scent doesn't last past a dayish.... But OMG!!! Will buy again though!
customer_reviews.author: Ron S.

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok!! Smells like I sprayed my dog with baby powder... the scent seems to last all day on him tho
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faulty sprayer
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell and have used it for 15 years in my salon. 2 years ago they changed the style of spayer and I have had so many faulty ones. Not spray at all, or stop before the can is empty. I have called to get this resolved, and it keeps happening. I'm sad, but it's too wasteful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just dog thing
customer_reviews.text: Missing a bottle cap ....I like it because it smell good
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Four Paws, Wonderful Scent and Lasts a Long Time!
customer_reviews.text: Just like I remember from years ago! I love this one over all the others, it's scent is awesome and it lasts for a really long time! Can't beat it!
customer_reviews.author: William L. Wynne II

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't spray after two uses
customer_reviews.text: My groomer uses this on my male dog. I am scent sensitive and this doesn't bother me and smells nice. I was so excited when I found it on Amazon. Used it two times and it will not spray anymore. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Christian

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful scent
customer_reviews.text: Smells awesome! But it tangles my long haired dogs; even if I spray just a small amount. Otherwise, it smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: Takes only a lite squirt to spruce up my dog but the nozzle quit working and my bottle is nearly full .
customer_reviews.author: lema

customer_reviews.title: Smells great on our pup!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve used this product before, it’s a must after our pups bath Time! Great scent!
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Very good long lasting men cologne smell.
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell that it give to my dog. I have been using this for more than 25 yrs on my dogs. Even my boys like to spary them self with it as a body deodorant. It smells like a regular men's cologne but last for several days. Dogs don't like the strong smell at first but they can get use to it.
customer_reviews.author: jazveroalina

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t really care for the smell. It smells somewhat like baby powder. Sprayed a bit too much and their coat came out oily.
customer_reviews.author: shelly

customer_reviews.title: Not great odor and leaked everywhere
customer_reviews.text: After reading great reviews I ordered this product, however I was very disappointed. The scent of this.. well, I don't even know how to describe it, but it was not good. It was like a mixture of bad old man's cologne and something kind of acidic. Also it leaked everywhere from the very start. I ended up throwing it away because I was tired of having the nasty smell on my hands every time I touched the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Ben and Alisha

customer_reviews.title: No stinky dog smell
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product and this particular fragrance for over 15 years. I use it on all my dogs. They smell great especially coming in from the rain!! No doggy stinky doggy smell. I use it on them after grooming and they smell fantastic!!! Tried the other fragrances but love this one the best.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Great smell but can stops working!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the smell of the black can for my pets... but on an average 3 out of the 4 cans I buy stop working after only using a few times! It's costly and frustrating to have all that product in the can but no way to get it out. I see this is a problem with a lot of others. Please fix this issue!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Paws
customer_reviews.text: Smells really nice, I ordered before and will continue to order
customer_reviews.author: S. hata

customer_reviews.title: Different
customer_reviews.text: Smaller can than I expected, but a little goes a long way with this product. This is not a scent I would want on a little girl dog though. Honestly, it reminds me of an older gentleman’s cologne
customer_reviews.author: Makenzie Pennington

customer_reviews.title: That it doesnt work and no responce from seller
customer_reviews.text: Only gave it a 1 back I couldn't give a 0 u have contacted seller repeatedly with no responce receiver damaged bent can and sprayer doesn't work it just leaked fluid down your fingers when you push the sprayer ridoculouse!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Evans

customer_reviews.title: love the smell - but the aerosol part didn't work
customer_reviews.text: love the smell - but the aerosol part didn't work. was credited back, so i'm not complaining, but i would have loved my pup smelling like this amazing smelling doggie perfume!
customer_reviews.author: lightingal

customer_reviews.title: Test the sprayer before you send to customers!!
customer_reviews.text: No matter how many times I twisted or turned the top, it wouldn’t spray! Very disappointed.........the little bit I could smell was great, so disappointed it wouldn’t spray!
customer_reviews.author: rosie

customer_reviews.title: Really wonderful smell that works for a day or two
customer_reviews.text: Great smell - really!! Just be careful to spray it out of doors (the aerosol scent hangs strongly in the air), and don't use too much, as the scent is strong and can seem "heavy" if you put on too much. The next time, I might spray it on my hands and then just "wipe-down" my dog. The scent lasts a good day or two, and it is a really nice smell - kind of like "Obsession" for dogs!
customer_reviews.author: lisabu

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: I ran out of this and could not find it anywhere, so I was so happy when I realized I can order it online. I love to spray this on my dog after giving her a bath. It smells great...not too overpowering or baby powder smelling. I will buy this again when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: R. C.

customer_reviews.title: OMG GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Smells exactly as it did decades ago when my mom put it on our Shepard then! Quality, long-lasting scent...also makes a nice room deodorizer with some scent of class besides on your pet!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Hansbury

customer_reviews.title: Good scent that lasts.
customer_reviews.text: It has a very pleasant smell, more on the masculine side which is perfect because I have 2 Male dogs. I sprayed it on them as soon as I took it out of the box and it lasted a good week to 10 days. I will buy this again in the future
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sweet smelling
customer_reviews.text: Just like the stuff the groomer uses. Our puppy smells sweet.
customer_reviews.author: George K. Zane

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality, not working
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with quality. I tried to use it and it seems that all the air pressure is gone. You can feel the product is in there, but nothing comes out. They should make sure they are selling products that work.
customer_reviews.author: D.L.H.B. Negron

customer_reviews.title: It spells like bad body odor
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it stated that it had clean powder scent. It spells like bad body odor. It's horrible, I immediately had to give my dog a bath.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Pelayo

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Used this cologne on dogs 40 years ago at grooming school... still love the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Mechele Colvin

customer_reviews.title: Smells Nice & Lasts!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Lasts and gets rid of the doggie odor. Not overpowering, just a small spray will do. I have tied alot of products and found this works the best on my dog. Black is the original scent - brut ( a clean scent, resembles a nice men's cologne) Silver - Sunflower scent Gold - Poison-like scent Red - CK One-like scent
customer_reviews.author: ND

customer_reviews.title: Cant Get The Product To Spray!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two bottles because I love the smell of the cologne for my bog....but neither one of the two cans I bought from this seller works, I can't get either can to spray.....not happy about buying this product at all!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: It's OK. Makes my dog smell like baby powder. He doesn't seem to mind the scent, but he gets freaked out when I spray him with the aerosol can. The sound freaks him out. Scent only seems to last for a day. Good if you have guests coming over and you don't want your pet to smell bad, but I don't think I'll be spraying him every day with it.
customer_reviews.author: kyldh

customer_reviews.title: Alway a winner ~!!
customer_reviews.text: The gold can is always good, I ordered the silver can once and totally hated the smell. I guess the smell is in the eyes of the beholder but if you go with the Gold can I really don't think you'll go wrong. This has a clean & refreshing smell .. I don't spray it directing on my dogs because they'll jump & maybe get it in their eyes. I just spray it on my hand and that way I can rub it everywhere :-) Jenn Burnette
customer_reviews.author: JennB

customer_reviews.title: Best dog cologne on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is simply the best cologne I've found for my pet. I've tried several others, and this one is the best smelling (but not too strong) and lasts quite a while (several days, sometimes about a week) It's great to use between bathing - great product !!!! We also have the 'red' one, and it's pretty good too, but this one's scent we like the best.
customer_reviews.author: J&R

customer_reviews.title: Smells like a boy!
customer_reviews.text: In the past, many years ago, I used a cologne for one of my dogs that was a reinterpretation of RED cologne for women. That's NOT what this is. It smells like a men's cologne, not what I wanted for my female pooch. It smells fine, just not feminine.
customer_reviews.author: A. Purse

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It makes my Bulldog smell wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It makes my Bulldog smell wonderful. It has a masculine smell. Perfect for male dogs. I also love ''White Dalmatians''(white diamonds smell), but that is a female scent. I bought some when I had my 2 female Basset Hounds. I do recommend ''FOUR PAWS COLOGNE'' on black. You will not be disappointed, promise.
customer_reviews.author: paula pounds

customer_reviews.title: Just tried to use the doggy perfume, and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Just tried to use the doggy perfume, and the bottle don't even spray!!! Just dribbles a little. Very upset, I would appreciate it if the seller would contact me, or refund my account! Can't even return it!! Grrrrr
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent and longevity
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for years and love it. I worked at an animal hospital in the early '90s and this is the product the groomer used...fell in love with it immediately!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this on my dog for 7 years and was almost out. Was happy to find it still available on Amazon since the pet store quit carrying it. The scent is very nice and lasts for a good while before having to reapply.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Oakes

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good! I used the black four paws for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Smells so good! I used the black four paws for a few years, which I think smells really good. This gold one smells better, more girly for my dog. So clean, and lasts for a few days that's why I like the Four Paws brand, I have used other brands but they don't last like these do.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie R.

customer_reviews.title: smells like womans cologne from 1980
customer_reviews.text: The smell of the cologne it's too girly, smells like womans cologne from 1980.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: kind of smells like baby powder & doesn't last very long mb 12 ...
customer_reviews.text: Product came as advertised on time. Only negative thing I could say is the scent is a little too strong, kind of smells like baby powder & doesn't last very long mb 12 hours. Overall does as advertised & bottle will last a very long time I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DonSlinger

customer_reviews.title: Longest lasting pet colone on the market.
customer_reviews.text: This is the longest lasting cologne for pets on the market. Smells fantastic. We live where its wet and our girl sleeps in our bed. Nobody likes the smell of wet dog but this is a lifesaver for her and I!
customer_reviews.author: Chaeli Kelekoma

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Very good product I really love it for my pet .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Caused me to get migraines
customer_reviews.text: Smells wonderful lasts a long time on pet. But we have to spray it on the pet outside. This cologne caused me to get severe migraines if sprayed indoors. Must be the preservative they use.
customer_reviews.author: anne d.

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent! Need to replace?
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite puppy scent. Hard to find. Although after one application the bottle wouldn't spray anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole F.

customer_reviews.title: ... about doggy cologne at first but I am so glad I ordered this product
customer_reviews.text: I was kind of unsure about doggy cologne at first but I am so glad I ordered this product. Not only does my dog no longer stink after trips to the lake or to the park but after I spray it on him and he runs around my house the cologne makes my house smell great too. The fragrance is nice but not overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Old lady perfume
customer_reviews.text: It’s not the same scent as I remembered. This smells like an old lady’s perfume.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Arhelger

customer_reviews.title: Wow, your dog smell terrific!
customer_reviews.text: No time for a bath? Spray that stinky pooch with some of this! He'll smell like he just got out of the day spa, at least until he runs around outside again and gets all funked up. It's good stuff and I recommend. I buy 2 cans at a time as the cans are a little small.
customer_reviews.author: ShadesDude

customer_reviews.title: Does not spray.
customer_reviews.text: I just pulled it out to use. Can is full but does not spray. Went to “return” on Amazon and says I cannot return.
customer_reviews.author: Countygirl66

customer_reviews.title: Sprayer quit on 10 bottles still full
customer_reviews.text: The paw colony I have been use I gotta for 20 years but here lately I had trashed over 10 bottles because of tops. Fix it or you have lost costumer Kathryn Bennett
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn B.

customer_reviews.title: Linda
customer_reviews.text: I love paws cologne it last a long time on my lil man thanks
customer_reviews.author: Linda reid

customer_reviews.title: Makes dog sneeze
customer_reviews.text: My dog just keeps on sneezing and I have bought 2 different brands but this is the only one that makes him go crazy with the sneezing
customer_reviews.author: veronica Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells great! Takes very little, I spray on my hands and rub on dog.
customer_reviews.author: ceceo

customer_reviews.title: 60% of the Time, it Works Everytime.
customer_reviews.text: Oh, Baxter, you are my little gentleman. I'll take you to foggy London town 'cause you are my little gentleman.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Love the baby smell
customer_reviews.text: Love how my puppy smells & how the scent spreads around my home.
customer_reviews.author: Angelika Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Sprayer does not work.
customer_reviews.text: Scent smells great. After a few months of use, bottle is full but sprayer does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: False advertising! 3 cans purchased and none work.
customer_reviews.text: DOES NOT WORK! I feel cheated. All 3 bottles do not work and I am holding back tears and maintaining my composure. Please do not end up like me. Bamboozled!
customer_reviews.author: Marlena

customer_reviews.title: Order 4, Got 12 @ still keep sending  " STOP'
customer_reviews.text: Order Only 4 Paw Cologne. Keep sending Every 3 Mouths, Cant get them to stop. Want take returns, Do not send Any more. 10 Pound dog does not Bath in Cologne
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, long lasting and only takes a amount of spray.
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, long lasting and only takes a small amount of spray. It's best to spray outside on your pet because it is strong. The one time I sprayed it on my dog inside he started sneezing however that is the only time it seemed to bother him.
customer_reviews.author: TANIA OLSON

customer_reviews.title: Don’t work awful
customer_reviews.text: Does not spray it’s broke. Pursued 2 cans and neither of them work
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Toth

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This product is really bad. First of all it came without lead and the spray didn't work. I barely could spray it on my dog. It just didn't work! Also my dog had a rush after using it couple of times. So it went straight to the garbage! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Lusine

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Stinks! I used this once and I will never ever ever spray it again. Smells like bad axe spray. Get the baby powder scent. Not this.
customer_reviews.author: puppylove

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This came very quickly--have used it for years. Smells great--seems to have an improved nozzle! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: R.C. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: I love this dog cologne
customer_reviews.text: I love this dog cologne! however 2 out of maybe 5 that i've ordered came with a defective spray. I usually get the black scent! smells amazing. only 2 stars though for the defective sprays.
customer_reviews.author: hong hoang

customer_reviews.title: I love putting this on my dog after a bath or ...
customer_reviews.text: The smell has a powder scent to it. I love putting this on my dog after a bath or when his odor starts to get heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Cortes

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!! I have been using for years and they only chage de sistem of their spray!!! 1000% recommended
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz

customer_reviews.title: Faulty sprayers
customer_reviews.text: The smell is wonderful and my customers love it but unfortunately every time I buy 3 or 4 cans religiously 2 cans sprayer quits working and I end up having to throw it in the trash
customer_reviews.author: Shell999

customer_reviews.title: Ten dollars for four squirts What a rip off
customer_reviews.text: Will not spray Used two times on my dogs and is still full but won’t spray
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S. Calta

customer_reviews.title: I got wrong item
customer_reviews.text: I need to know why i ordered perfume for my dog and i got deodorant for men???
customer_reviews.author: Edward Pérez

customer_reviews.title: OLD MAN BRUTE SMELL
customer_reviews.text: If you want your dog to smell like a old man that wears a brute cologne, then this is the perfect product. This cologne is not for me, but the smell does last long.
customer_reviews.author: Joiie

customer_reviews.title: 2 cans ordered one doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: The product does work and smells good as well. The reason I only gave it 4 stars is because I ordered 2 cans but my second can doesnt spray as it should. If this issue is handled by Amazon which I'm sure they will I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Dorvan

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: Smells good, I don't think it lasts as long but still good for the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Meliha

product_meta.title: Four Paws Cologne
product_meta.description: Style:GoldThe delightful scent of Four Paws Gold Cologne will last for days and can be used in between baths to freshen up pets. 3 oz. (88 ml)
feature_bullets: Four Paws grooming essentials keep pets happy, healthy, clean, and smelling great while providing for day-to-day grooming needs
Four Paws colognes are easy-to-use sprays that keep pets deodorized and smelling wonderful
Colognes last between 24 hours and several days and can be used as often as necessary
Comes in four variations: red, gold, silver, and original
